LanguageData.ZeroTechGel.label: Zero Sub Gel
LanguageData.ZeroTechGel.description: A very soft material that has been treated with wood-like properties and can be used in many applications.
LanguageData.ZeroTechWeave.label: Zero Sub fabric
LanguageData.ZeroTechWeave.description: A very elastic fabric that can be used in various occasions and has great properties after treatment.
LanguageData.ZeroTechAlloy.label: Zero Sub Alloy
LanguageData.ZeroTechAlloy.description: A beautiful and strong metal that first appeared in the three-star district, and those who held this metal called it the metal of the gods. According to later research, this should be a new alloy made of fiberglass and an unknown substance, but its outstanding ability is undeniable
